storyTitle: As Employee, I want to perform task status updates to achieve accurate task tracking

functional.title: Verify employee can successfully update task status from 'In Progress' to 'Completed'
preconditions: Employee is logged in with valid credentials and has 'Employee' role permissions
Employee is on the task list page with at least one task visible
At least one task exists with status 'In Progress' assigned to the logged-in employee
Database connection is active and tasks table is accessible

steps.action: Navigate to the task list page by clicking 'Tasks' in the main navigation menu
steps.expectedResult: Task list page loads successfully displaying all tasks assigned to the employee with current status visible

steps.action: Locate a task with status 'In Progress' and click on the task row to select it
steps.expectedResult: Task details are displayed and the task is highlighted with a blue border indicating selection

steps.action: Click on the 'Status' dropdown menu located in the task details section
steps.expectedResult: Dropdown menu expands showing all available status options: 'Not Started', 'In Progress', 'Completed', 'On Hold', 'Cancelled'

steps.action: Select 'Completed' from the dropdown menu by clicking on it
steps.expectedResult: Dropdown closes and 'Completed' is now displayed in the status field

steps.action: Click the 'Save' button located at the bottom-right of the task details section
steps.expectedResult: Save button shows a loading spinner for up to 2 seconds while processing the update

steps.action: Wait for the system to process the status update
steps.expectedResult: Green confirmation banner appears at the top of the page displaying message 'Task status updated successfully' and the task status is updated to 'Completed' in the task list

postconditions: Task status is permanently updated to 'Completed' in the tasks table database
Status change is logged in the system with timestamp and employee user ID
Employee remains on the task list page with the updated task visible
Confirmation message automatically dismisses after 5 seconds

functional.title: Verify status change is logged with timestamp and user details
preconditions: Employee is logged in as user 'john.doe@company.com' with employee ID 'EMP-12345'
Employee has access to a task with ID 'TASK-001' with current status 'Not Started'
System time is synchronized and accurate
Audit logging is enabled in the system configuration

steps.action: Navigate to the task list and select task 'TASK-001'
steps.expectedResult: Task 'TASK-001' is selected and details are displayed with current status 'Not Started'

steps.action: Change the status from 'Not Started' to 'In Progress' using the status dropdown
steps.expectedResult: Status dropdown shows 'In Progress' as selected

steps.action: Click the 'Save' button to confirm the status change
steps.expectedResult: Confirmation message 'Task status updated successfully' appears and status is updated to 'In Progress'

steps.action: Navigate to the task history or audit log section by clicking 'View History' link on the task details
steps.expectedResult: Task history page opens showing all status changes for task 'TASK-001'

steps.action: Verify the most recent log entry contains: previous status, new status, timestamp, and user details
steps.expectedResult: Log entry displays: 'Status changed from Not Started to In Progress by john.doe@company.com (EMP-12345) at [current timestamp in format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS]'

postconditions: Status change log entry is permanently stored in the audit log table
Log entry includes all required fields: task ID, previous status, new status, user ID, user email, timestamp
Task history is accessible for future reference and reporting
No duplicate log entries are created for the same status change

functional.title: Verify employee can update status for multiple different tasks sequentially

steps.expectedResult: Task A details are displayed with status 'Not Started'

steps.action: Change Task A status to 'In Progress' and click 'Save'

steps.expectedResult: Task B details are displayed with status 'In Progress'

steps.action: Change Task B status to 'Completed' and click 'Save'
steps.expectedResult: Confirmation message appears and Task B status updates to 'Completed' in the task list

steps.action: Select Task C with status 'On Hold' from the task list

steps.action: Change Task C status to 'In Progress' and click 'Save'
steps.expectedResult: Confirmation message appears and Task C status updates to 'In Progress' in the task list

postconditions: All three tasks have their statuses updated correctly in the database
Each status change is logged separately with individual timestamps
Task list displays all updated statuses accurately
No status updates interfere with each other or cause data corruption

userStoryObject.title: As Employee, I want to perform task status updates to achieve accurate task tracking
userStoryObject.description:
CONTEXT & BACKGROUND: This story exists to ensure that employees can keep their task statuses up to date, which is crucial for project visibility and management. CURRENT STATE: Currently, there is no mechanism for employees to update task statuses, leading to confusion and miscommunication. DESIRED STATE: Employees can easily update their task statuses, ensuring that all stakeholders are aware of the current progress. KEY FUNCTIONALITY: • Dropdown menu for status selection • Save button for confirming updates • Confirmation message upon successful update • Logging of status changes USER INTERACTION FLOW: 1. Employee navigates to the task list. 2. Employee selects a task to update. 3. Employee chooses a new status from the dropdown. 4. Employee clicks the save button. 5. System validates the selection. 6. Confirmation message is displayed. TECHNICAL CONSIDERATIONS: • Data source: tasks table in the database • Validation rules: status must be one of the predefined options • API endpoints: POST /api/tasks/{id}/status • Security: Only authenticated employees can update task statuses • Performance: Updates should be processed within 2 seconds OUT OF SCOPE: • Bulk status updates SUCCESS METRICS: • 95% of status updates processed successfully

Persona: Employee (Employee)
